#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string str;
		int count[26]={0},i;
		cin>>str;
		for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
		{
			count[str[i]-'a']++;
		}
		int flag =0;
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(count[i]==0)
			{
				flag =1;
			}
		}
		string st= str;
		reverse(str.begin(),str.end());
		if(flag == 0 && str == st)
		{
			cout<<"palingram"<<"\n";
		}
		else
		if(str == st)
		{
			cout<<"palindrome"<<"\n";
		}
		else
		if(flag ==0)
		{
			cout<<"pangram"<<"\n";
		}
		else
		if(flag ==1)
		{
			cout<<"none"<<"\n";
		}
	}
}
